member.name: T:Nito.Async.ActionDispatcher
member.summary: A thread-safe queue of actions. Provides an event-based message loop when , along with a synchronization context for the executed actions.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with an empty action queue.

member.name: P:Nito.Async.ActionDispatcher.Current
member.summary: Gets the currently active action queue. For executing actions, this is their own action queue; for other threads, this is null.

member.name: M:Nito.Async.ActionDispatcher.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources.

member.name: M:Nito.Async.ActionDispatcher.QueueAction(System.Action)
member.summary: Queues an action to an action dispatcher.
member.param: The action to execute.

member.name: M:Nito.Async.ActionDispatcher.QueueExit
member.summary: Queues an exit action, causing to return.

member.name: M:Nito.Async.ActionDispatcher.Run
member.summary: Executes the action queue.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified .

member.summary: Creates a copy of this .
member.returns: The copy of this synchronization context.

The object passed to the delegate.

member.summary: Invokes the callback in the synchronization context synchronously. The callback is placed in the action queue.
member.param: The delegate to call.
The object passed to the delegate.

member.name: M:Nito.Async.Sync.InvokeAndCallback(System.Action,System.Action{System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs},System.Object)
member.summary: Runs followed by with arguments indicating success. If raises an exception, is invoked with arguments indicating the error.
member.param: The action to perform.
The callback to indicate success or error.
The user state to include in the arguments to the callback. May be null.

member.name: M:Nito.Async.Sync.InvokeAndCallback``1(System.Func{``0},System.Action{Nito.Async.AsyncResultEventArgs{``0}},System.Object)
member.summary: Runs followed by with arguments indicating success, including its return value. If raises an exception, is invoked with arguments indicating the error.
member.param: The action to perform.
The callback to indicate success or error.
The user state to include in the arguments to the callback. May be null.
member.typeparam: The type of the result of the action.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the timer should become enabled again by default when returns.

member.summary: Cancels any pending timeouts.

member.name: M:Nito.Async.Timer.Dispose
member.summary: Frees all resources used by this timer.

member.name: E:Nito.Async.Timer.Elapsed
member.summary: Occurs when the timer's wait time has elapsed.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a timer is enabled.

member.name: P:Nito.Async.Timer.Interval
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the approximate time the timer will wait before invoking .

member.name: M:Nito.Async.Timer.Restart
member.summary: Disables and then enables the timer, restarting the wait time.

member.name: M:Nito.Async.Timer.SetSingleShot(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets the timer to wait for an interval.

member.summary: Requests this to exit, blocks the calling thread until this exits, and then cleans up all resources.

member.summary: Queues work for the to do.

member.summary: Queues work for the to do, and blocks the calling thread until it is complete.

member.summary: Queues work for the to do, and blocks the calling thread until it is complete or until the specified time has elapsed.
member.param: The work to do. This delegate may not throw an exception.
The time to wait for to execute.
member.returns: true if executed completely; false if there was a timeout.

member.name: P:Nito.Async.ActionThread.IsAlive
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is still alive (has started but not yet exited).

member.name: P:Nito.Async.ActionThread.IsBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a background thread. This property may not be accessed after a .

member.name: M:Nito.Async.ActionThread.Join
member.summary: Requests this to exit and then blocks the calling thread until this exits.

member.name: M:Nito.Async.ActionThread.Join(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Requests this to exit and then blocks the calling thread until either this exits or a timeout occurs.
member.param: The length of time to wait for this to exit.
member.returns: true if this exited cleanly; false if the timout occurred.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the scheduling priority of this . This property may not be accessed after a .

member.summary: Starts this running. A thread may not be started more than once.

member.summary: Restores as the current synchronization context.

member.name: T:Nito.Async.SynchronizationContextProperties
member.summary: Flags that identify differences in behavior in various implementations.

member.name: F:Nito.Async.SynchronizationContextProperties.None
member.summary: The makes no guarantees about any of the properties in .

member.name: F:Nito.Async.SynchronizationContextProperties.NonReentrantPost
member.summary: is guaranteed to be non-reentrant (if called from a thread that is not the 's specific associated thread, if any).

member.name: F:Nito.Async.SynchronizationContextProperties.NonReentrantSend
member.summary: is guaranteed to be non-reentrant (if called from a thread that is not the 's specific associated thread, if any).

member.name: F:Nito.Async.SynchronizationContextProperties.Synchronized
member.summary: Delegates queued to the are guaranteed to execute one at a time.

member.name: F:Nito.Async.SynchronizationContextProperties.Sequential
member.summary: Delegates queued to the are guaranteed to execute in order. Any claiming to be should also claim to be .

member.name: F:Nito.Async.SynchronizationContextProperties.SpecificAssociatedThread
member.summary: The has exactly one managed thread associated with it. Any specifying should also specify .

member.name: F:Nito.Async.SynchronizationContextProperties.Standard
member.summary: The makes the standard guarantees (, , , , and ). This is defined as a constant because most custom synchronization contexts do make these guarantees.

member.summary: A global register of flags for types.

member.param: The type derived from to test.
member.returns: The properties guaranteed by .

member.summary: Registers a type claiming to provide certain guarantees.
member.param: The type derived from .
The guarantees provided by this type.
